Detailed Description

Database abstraction layer base class.

This class is intended to act as an abstraction layer for various database drivers. It's a pure virtualization class and not recommended for direct use. To get a proper database class instance, it's better to utilize Watchtowers database management and use wtDBGetConnection().

Member Function Documentation

Returns:
TRUE if connected, otherwise FALSE

Returns the number of rows affected by a SELECT operation

Parameters:
The query or NULL to use the last query
Returns:
An integer carrying the number of rows affected by the operation.
